explains: v. 覆在……上面（overlie 的过去式）；覆盖，铺；（尤指以感情或品质）撒满；（声音）盖过
n. 套图透明膜；覆盖图；覆盖物，涂层；覆盖；附加的特性
wordGroup: map overlay 分色透眉；地图着色

sentences.en: An overlay showing population can be placed on top of the map.
sentences.cn: 可以在地图上加一层显示人口的透明膜。

sentences.en: During commercials, an overlay will appear at the bottom of the screen, prompting viewers to press a button to request a free sample or order a coupon or a catalogue.
sentences.cn: 在广告期间，屏幕底部会出现一条信息，提示观众按下按钮以请求获得免费样品或订购优惠券或目录。

sentences.en: There is an overlay of fresh dewiness of petals.
sentences.cn: 有一层新鲜的覆盖露珠的花瓣散落。
